Should govt aid black people?

Source: R/gss_vars_93.R
helpblk.Rd

helpblk

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question Now look at CARD BF. Some people think that Black people have been discriminated against for so long that the government has a special obligation to help improve their living standards. Others believe that the government should not be giving special treatment to Black people.A. Where would you place yourself on this scale, or haven't you made up your mind on this?

Values

  • 1 government should help

  • 3 agree with both

  • 5 no special treatment

  • NA(d) don't know / NA(i) iap / NA(j) I don't have a job / NA(m) dk, na, iap / NA(n) no answer / NA(p) not imputable / NA(r) refused / NA(s) skipped on web / NA(u) uncodeable / NA(x) not available in this release / NA(y) not available in this year / NA(z) see codebook
